column1: "description": "This table provides Sector-wise and Mode-wise Capacity Addition (Provisional) during the Twelfth Plan in Megawatts (MW)
column2: indicating that addition of gas capacity is provisional and will depend upon the availability of gas. This will be reviewed during the Mid-Term Appraisal (MTA)."

column1: "title": "Download XLS for Sector-wise and Mode-wise Capacity Addition (MW) - Twelfth Five Year Plan (2012-17) (Provisional)"
